juzs.text: Mi ne pretend innocence myself. Sin est advokat de vice escept por those ating mercy my Lord My Lord est Forgiver Merciful
Regx dir Bring him me mi lu him work me When li talked kun him li dir Hodiaux vi hav prominent pozici us
Li dir Far me treasurer mi spert en this are kaj knowledgeable
Ni do establ Joseph ter regul as li wished Ni dusx our mercy whomever ni testament, ni neniam fail recompense des righteous
Additionally rekompenc Hereafter est eben bon those kred plumb righteous life
Joseph's frat ven; when ili entered li recognized them while ili ne recognize him
Post li proviz them their provisions li dir Next temp bring vi your half-brother. Vi ne seg mi don plen mezur trakt vi generously
Vi fail bring him me vi ne get akci me vi ne eben ven close
Ili dir Ni negotiate his patr him. Ni surely do this
Li tiam instructed his assistants Put their goods their bags When ili trov them their return their famili ili ven baldaux
When ili returned their patr ili dir Our patr ni ne long get any provisions vi send our frat us. Ni pren bon zorg de him
Li dir mi fid vi him as mi fid vi his frat antaux ke? DI EST PUT Protector DE all merciful UNU LI est PLEJ Merciful

When ili opened their bags ili trov their goods returned them. Ili dir Our patr ki plur ni pet por? Here est our goods returned us! Ni can do proviz por our famili protekt our frat ricev 1 plur camel-load! This est certainly a profitable deal
Li dir mi ne send him vi vi don me solen pledge DI ke vi bring him dors vi utterly overwhelmed When ili don him their solen pledge li dir DI witnessing cxio ni dir
Kaj li dir O my fil ne enter 1 pord; enter separate pord! Mi ne sav vi anything predetermined DI. Al DI aparten all judgments Mi fid en Him en Him shall all trusters put their fid

(When ili ir Joseph) ili entered en accordance kun their patr instrukci. this ne sxangx anything dekret DI Jacob hav privat raci por pet them do this! Li posed nepr knowledge ke ni instru him plej popol ne kon
When ili entered Joseph's met li brought his frat closer al him dir mi est your frat; ne saddened their actions
When li proviz them their provisions li ej drink tas his frat bag tiam announcer anonc owners this karavan est thieves
Ili dir as ili ven them Ki vi perd
Ili dir Ni perd regx tas. Anyone returns gxi ricev ekstr camel-load; mi personally garanti this
Ili dir DI vi kon plen put ni ne ven here commit evil nor est ni thieves
Ili dir Ki est punishment thief se vi est liars
Ili dir punishment gxi trov his bag est ti thief aparten al vi! Ni tiel pun kulp

Li tiam started inspekt their uj getting his frat uj li ekstrakt gxi his frat uj! Ni tiel perfekt scheme Joseph; li ne kept his frat li aplik regx legx. Ke est vol DI. Ni exalt whomever ni choose alt rang. Super cxiu knowledgeable unu tie est unu est eben knowledgeable
Ili dir li sxtel tial did frat de his en des preter, Joseph concealed his feelings en ne don them any clue Li dir (al Vi est really mav. DI est fully aware da your accusations)
Ili dir O vi nobl unu li patr hav est elderly vi sorb unu de us his met? Ni seg vi est kind hom
Li dir "DI forbid ni sorb 1 whose possession ni trov our goods. Otherwise ni est unjust

When ili despaired de sxangx his mens ili conferred together Their eldest dir vi realize ke your patr Do pren solen pledge el vi DI? En des preter vi perd Joseph. Mi ne las this ej my patr don me permission aux DI jugx me Li est bon Jugx
Ir your patr tell him! ‘Our patr your fil committed theft. Ni kon por sure this est ki ni witnessed This est unexpected occurrence
‘Vi pet community ni est karavan ven us. Ni telling truth
Li dir Ja vi konspir port nepr scheme Kviet pacienc est my nur recourse. Maj DI bring them all dors me Li est Omniscient Sagx
Li torn them dir mi grieving Joseph. His okul torn blank el grieving tial mult; li est ver sad
Ili dir DI vi keep grieving Joseph vi igx ill aux vi mort
Li dir mi simply plend DI my dilemma grief mi kon DI ki vi ne kon
O my fil ir fetch Joseph his frat neniam despair di grace Neniom despairs de di grace disbelieving popol

When ili entered (Joseph's) kvartal ili dir O vi nobl unu ni sufer a lot de hardship our famili ni brought inferior goods. Ni esper vi don us plen mezur est charitable al us. DI REKOMPENC DES charitable
Li dir vi recall ki vi Do did al Joseph his frat when vi est ignorant
Ili dir Vi est Joseph. Li dir mi est Joseph here est my frat. DI BEN us. Est because se 1 plumb righteous life steadfastly perseveres DI neniam fails rekompenc des righteous
Ili dir DI DI ver prefer vi over us! Ni est definitely wrong
Li dir Tie ne est blame vi hodiaux. Maj DI forgive vi. De all merciful unu Li est plej Merciful
Pren this cxemiz de min; when vi jxet gxi my patr vizagx his vizi restored Bring your whole famili ven me
Eben karavan alven their patr dir mi sens odor Joseph. someone enlighten me
Ili dir DI vi est ankoraux your old confusion
When bearer bon news alven li jxet (cxemiz) his vizagx whereupon his vizi restored Li dir mi ne tell vi mi kon DI ki vi ne kon
Ili dir Our patr pregx our forgiveness; ni est wrong ja
Li dir mi implore my Lord forgive vi; Li est Forgiver Merciful
When ili entered Joseph's kvartal li embraced his parents dir Welcome al Egypt! DI testament VI est SEKUR here

Li raised his parents tron. Ili fal prostrate antaux him. Li dir O my patr this est fulfillment my old songx. My Lord far gxi ven prav. Li ben me liver me prison brought vi el dezert post diabl driv kojn me my frat! My Lord est Kind towards whomever Li vol. Li est Knower plej Sagx
My Lord Vi don me kingship instru me interpretation de songx! Initiator de heavens ter; Vi est my Lord Mastr en this life Hereafter Let me mort as submitter count me kun des righteous
(This est news preter ni reveal vi. Vi est prezent when ili far their unanimous decision jxet Joseph put) as ili konspir together
Plej popol ne materi ki vi ne kred
Vi ne pet them any mon; vi simply liver this reminder all popol
Tial many proofs heavens ter don them ili pas them heedlessly
majority de those kred en DI do ne do committing idol worship
Ili garanti ke overwhelming retribution hav el DI testament ne strik them Hor ne ven them suddenly when ili malpli expect gxi
Dir This est my path mi invit DI klar proof kaj do those sekv me DI GLOR. Mi ne est idol worshiper
Ni ne send vi hom ni inspir chosen el popol de various communities. Ili ne roam ter Did seg consequences por those antaux them? abode Hereafter est far put those plumb righteous life. Vi tiam kompren
Just when messengers despair opini ili rejected our victory ven them. Ni tiam sav whomever ni choose while our retribution kulp popol est unavoidable
En their histori tie est lecion those posed intelligence This ne fabricated Hadith; this (Quran) konfirm all previous scriptures proviz detal de cxio est beacon mercy those kred
M. R. These (liter) est proofs this scripture. Ki revealed vi your Lord est truth plej popol ne kred

DI EST UNU raised heavens SEN pillars TI VI SEG TIAM assumed all AUXTORITAT. Li committed sun lun each kur (en its orbit por predetermined period! Li controls all ajx eksplik revelations ke vi ating certainty meeting your Lord)
Li est Unu konstru ter ej gxi mont river! Kaj el different kinds frukt Li far them par - Vir females. Nokt overtakes tag. These est solid proofs popol pens
Sur ter tie est adjacent lots produkt orchards grapes crops palm arb - dioecious non-dioecious. Ili irrigated sam akv ni prefer kelk da them others en mangx! These est solid proofs popol kompren

Vi ever wonder efektiv wonder est their dir ni turn into polv do ni recreated re These est unu disbelieved their Lord These est unu incurred shackles their kol. These est unu incurred Infer wherein ili abide forever

Ili challenge vi bring doom them rather than torn righteous! Sufficient precedents set them en des preter. Ja your Lord est plen da forgiveness popol their transgressions your Lord est ankaux strict en enforcing retribution
Those disbelieved dir nur mirakl ven him his Lord (ni tiam kred.) Vi est simply warner - Cxiu community ricev direkt teacher
DI kon KI CXIU female URS KI CXIU womb releases GAJN! Cxio Li does perfectly mezur
Knower de all sekret declarations; Supreme plej Alt
est des sam vi conceal your thoughts deklar them kasx darkness nokt akt daylight

(Shifts angxel) sorb rest each unu de vi - Ili est vi behind vi. Ili rest vi gard vi en accordance kun di ordon! Tiel DI ne sxangx stat any popol ili far decision sxangx. Di vol any hardship any popol ne force stop gxi. Por ili hav neniom Him as Lord kaj Mastr
Li est Unu montr vi fulm source tim ankaux as esper Li iniciat loaded nub
Tondr lauxd His glory kaj tial do angxel reverence por Him. Li send fulm bolts which traf en accordance kun His vol. Ili argue DI kvankam His potenc est awesome
Imploring Him est nur legitimate supplication while idols ili implore Him ever ne respond. Tiel ili est those strecx their man akv nothing reaches their busx. supplications disbelievers est en vain
Di prostrates everyone heavens ter volont unwillingly tial do their ombr en des maten vesper

Dir Who est Lord heavens ter? Dir DI. Dir tiam do vi set Him mastr who ne posed any potenc do benefit harm eben themselves? Dir Est blind sam as seer? darkness sam as light est ili trov idols DI kre creations simil al His creations al pint ne disting 2 creations? Dir DI est Creator all ajx Li est 1 Supreme

Li send down akv cxiel kauxz val overflow tiam rapid produkt abund sxauxm! Similarly when ili uz fajr rafin metal their jewelry equipment sxauxm produkt! DI TIEL cites analogies POR truth falsehood. As por sxauxm gxi ir waste while ke which benefits popol rest muel DI TIEL cites analogies

Those respond their Lord ind bon rekompenc. As por those failed respond Him ili posed cxio ter - Eben twice as mult - Ili readily don gxi as ransom Ili incurred mav reckoning their final abode est Infer; ki miserable destiny
Unu est recognizes your Lord's revelations vi truth egal al unu est est blind? Nur those posed intelligence pren heed
Ili est unu fulfill their pledge DI ne violate covenant
Ili join ki DI komand joined reverence their Lord tim dreadful reckoning
Ili steadfastly persevere streb their Lord observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) spend our provisions them secretly publicly counter evil kun bon! These ind put abode
Ili enter gxarden Eden together righteous among their parents their spouses their infan. Angxel enter them cxiu pord
Pac est vi vi steadfastly persevered Ki joyous destiny
As por those violate di covenant pledging keep gxi sever ki DI komand joined commit evil ili incurred condemnation; ili incurred mav destiny
DI est UNU increases provision whomever LI VOL withholds gxi Ili igx preoccupied this life; this life kompar al Hereafter est nil
Those disbelieve dir nur mirakl ven him his Lord (ni kred.) Dir DI send astray whomever Li vol direkt al Him nur those obe
Ili est unu kor gxoj memor DI! Absolutely per memor DI kor gxoj
Those kred plumb righteous life ind happiness joyous destiny

(Ni send vi O Rashad) this community just as ni did ali communities en des preter. Vi recite them ki ni reveal vi ili disbelieved en plej Gracious. dir Li est my Lord tie ne est di escept Li! Mi put my fid Him sol; al Him est my ultimate destiny

Ecx se Quran kauxz mont mov ter larm asunder dead parol (ili ne kred)! DI controls all AJX. Gxi ne temp believers est al don up realize ti DI willed Li direkt all popol? disbelievers ad sufer disasters consequence their own works hav disasters strik them di promes fulfilled DI testament NENIAM SXANGX predetermined destiny
Messengers vi ridiculed mi permes disbelievers port tiam mi pun them. Kiel terrible est My retribution

Est tie any egal al Unu controls cxiu single anim? Ili set idols rival DI! Dir Nom them! Vi inform Him de io ter Li ne kon? Aux est vi fabricating empty statements? Ja schemes de those disbelieve ornam their okul! Ili tiel diverted dekstr path. Whomever DI send astray neniam trov direkt teacher
Ili incurred retribution en this life retribution Hereafter est far mav Nothing protekt them DI
allegory Heaven which promes righteous flu streams inexhaustible provisions cool shade Such est destiny those observ righteousness while destiny disbelievers est Infer
Those ricev scripture gxoj en ki revealed vi; kelk others reject part de gxi. Dir mi simply enjoined worship DI neniam associate any idols Him! Mi invit Him Him est my ultimate destiny
Ni revealed these legx Arabic kaj vi ever acquiesce their wishes this knowledge ven vi vi ne hav ally nor protector DI
(Ni send messengers vi O Rashad) ni far them husbands wives infan! Ne messenger produkt mirakl di authorization en accordance kun specif predetermined temp
(DI erases whatever LI VOL FIKS whatever LI VOL). Kun Him est original Mastr Record
Ni montr vi ki ni promes them terminate your life antaux ke, your pland misi est liver message est us vok them kont
Ili ne seg cxiu tag ter brings them closer end DI decid their life sxpin irrevocably? Li est plej efficient Reckoner
Others them schemed DI aparten ultimate scheming Li kon ki everyone doing disbelievers vol trov out who ultimate winners est
Those disbelieved dir Vi est messenger! Dir DI suffices as witness me vi those posed knowledge scripture
R. scripture ni revealed vi en ord plumb popol darkness light - en accordance kun vol their Lord - Al path Almighty des Praiseworthy
path DI; Unu posed cxio heavens cxio ter. Ve al disbelievers; ili incurred terrible retribution
Ili est des unu don priority this life over Hereafter repel voj DI streb far gxi crooked ili ir far astray
(Ni ne send any messenger predik) lang his popol en ord clarify ajx them! DI TIAM SEND astray whomever LI VOL DIREKT whomever LI VOL. Li est Almighty plej Sagx
Tiel ni send Moses our mirakl dir Plumb your popol darkness light remind them de tag DI. These est lecion cxiu steadfast appreciative ul
Recall ti Moses dir al his popol Memor di blessings vi! Li sav vi Pharaoh's popol inflicted mav persecution vi bucx your fil sxpar your daughters! Ke exacting trial your Lord
Your Lord dekret plur vi dank Me des plur mi don vi vi torn unappreciative tiam My retribution est severe
Moses dir vi disbelieve all popol ter DI est en ne bezon Praiseworthy

Hav vi ne auxd pri those antaux vi! - Popol Noah ‘Aad Thamoud others ven them kon nur al DI? Their messengers ir them klar proofs ili trakt them contempt dir Ni disbelieve en ki vi send kun. Ni est skeptical pri your message plen de dub

Their messengers dir vi hav dub DI; Initiator de heavens ter? Li invit vi nur forgive your pek don vi another sxanc redeem Ili dir Vi est ne plur than humans us want repel us voj our parents uz worship Montr us kelk profound auxtoritat

Their messengers dir al them Ni est ne plur than humans vi DI ben whomever Li chooses His servants! Ni possibly ne montr vi any kind da authorization escept en accordance kun di testament En DI believers fid
Why ni ne fid DI when Li direkt us our paths? Ni steadfastly persevere en des vizagx de your persecution. En DI all trusters fid
Those disbelieved dir al their messengers Ni do gxi banish vi el our land vi revert our religi. Their Lord inspir them Ni inevitably annihilate transgressors
Ni let vi logx their land them. This est (rekompenc) those reverence My majesty reverence My promes
Ili issued challenge consequently cxiu stubborn tiran ended doomed
Awaiting him est Infer wherein li trink putrid akv
Li gulp gxi down li ne star gxi as death ven him cxiu direction li neniam mort! Awaiting him est terrible retribution
allegory de those disbelieve their Lord their works est ashes violent vent stormy tag! Ili gajn nothing whatever ili earn such est farthest straying
Vi ne realize ti DI Do kre heavens ter specif purpose Li vol Li remove vi substitute neo creation your met
This ne est tro difficult por DI

When ili all bud DI followers dir al estr Ni uz sekv vi! Can vi sxpar us eben a malpli mord de di retribution? Ili dir Hav DI direkt us ni direkt vi! Tuj est tro late ni grieve resort pacienc tie ne est exit us

Kaj diabl dir judgment issued DI promes vi truthful promes mi promes vi mi romp my promes! Mi ne hav potenc vi; mi simply invit vi vi akcept my invitation! Do ne blame me blame nur yourselves! My plend ne help vi nor can your plend help me Mi disbelieved your idolizing me transgressors incurred painful retribution
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili admitted gxarden flu streams Ili abide therein forever en accordance kun vol their Lord Their greeting therein est Pac
Vi ne seg DI Do cited ekzempl bon vort bon arb radik firmly fiks its brancx est alt en des cxiel
Gxi produkt its crop cxiu sezon as desegn its Lord DI TIEL cites EKZEMPL POPOL KE ILI PREN heed
Ekzempl mav vort est de mav arb chopped soil nivel; gxi ne hav radik keep gxi star
DI strengthens those KRED proven VORT en this life Hereafter Di send transgressors astray. Cxio est en accordance kun di testament
Vi not those respond di blessings hav per disbelieving kaj tiel brought disaster their own famili
Infer est their destiny wherein ili brul; ki miserable end
Ili set rivals rang DI divert others His path! dir Gxu awhile; your final destiny est Infer
Exhort My servants kred observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don charity) our provisions them secretly publicly tag ven kie tie est nek komerc nor nepotism
DI EST 1 KRE heavens TER LI SEND down CXIEL AKV PRODUKT all kinds da FRUKT your sustenance! Li committed sxip dejxor vi mar en accordance kun His ordon. Li committed river ankaux dejxor vi
Li committed sun lun your service continuously. Li committed nokt tag dejxor vi
Li don vi all kinds da ajx ke vi implore Him por. Vi count di blessings vi neniam encompass them. Ja human est transgressing unappreciative
Recall ti Abraham dir My Lord far this peaceful land protekt me my infan el worshipping idols
My Lord ili misled tial many popol. As por those sekv me ili aparten me As por those disobey me Vi est Forgiver Merciful

Our Lord mi sald part de my famili en this plantless val je Your Sankt Dom. Our Lord ili est observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) let throngs de popol converge them proviz por them all kinds da frukt ili est appreciative
Our Lord Vi kon whatever ni conceal whatever ni deklar! - nothing kasx DI ter nor heavens
Lauxd est DI granting me my old agx, Ismail Isaac. My Lord respond prayers
My Lord far me unu who consistently observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) ankaux my infan! Our Lord placx respond my prayers
My Lord forgive me my parents believers tag when reckoning sorb met
ever ne opini DI est unaware de ki transgressors doing Li nur respites them tag kie okul stare en horror
As ili rush graves their vizagx rigard upward their okul ne eben blink their mens horrified
Vi avert popol tag when retribution ven them. Those transgressed dir Our Lord don us 1 plur respite Ni tiam respond Your vok sekv messengers. vi ne jxur en des preter vi last forever
Vi dwelled hejm de those antaux vi wronged their anim vi seg clearly ki ni did them! Ni set many precedents vi
Ili schemed their schemes DI est fully aware da their schemes Ja their schemes est sufficient erase mont
Ne pens ke DI testament ever romp His promes His messengers! DI est Almighty Avenger
Tag ven when this ter substituted neo ter ankaux heavens everyone brought DI Unu Supreme
Vi seg kulp ke tag cxen en shackles
Their garments far gudr fajr overwhelm their vizagx
DI testament pag each anim whatever gxi earned DI est plej efficient reckoner
This est proclamation popol avert herewith let them kon ti Li est nur unu di kaj those posed intelligence sorb heed
